Douglas Linscott Webster

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Frank Balli
  3. Location of Family: Franklin, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Franklin, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 12
  7. Date of Birth: 12/9/1900, New York City, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: OTR 429; OTR 191; Franklin City News, 28 June 1913; National Orphan Train Complex.
